member.summary: List of variables for this environment.

member.name: T:JeniusApps.Nightingale.Data.Models.FormData
member.summary: Class representing form data for a request's multipart form body.

member.name: P:JeniusApps.Nightingale.Data.Models.FormData.Value
member.summary: Value of form data if it's not a file.

member.name: P:JeniusApps.Nightingale.Data.Models.FormData.ContentType
member.summary: HTTP content type defined by the user.

member.name: P:JeniusApps.Nightingale.Data.Models.FormData.FilePaths
member.summary: List of paths for this form data to attach.

member.name: P:JeniusApps.Nightingale.Data.Models.FormData.AutoContentType
member.summary: The default content type for this form data. Usually set when selecting a file. The file's content type should be assigned here.

member.summary: Object designed to be a historical snapshot of a request item that was sent.

member.summary: Last used date of this history item.

member.name: T:JeniusApps.Nightingale.Data.Models.IHasParent
member.summary: Interface depicting an item that contains an ID reference to its parent.

member.name: T:JeniusApps.Nightingale.Data.Models.Item
member.summary: This workspace item represents an object that can be displayed in the tree of the workspace.

member.name: P:JeniusApps.Nightingale.Data.Models.Item.IsTemporary
member.summary: If true, the item is just a tab and it hasn't been saved to the workspace item tree.

member.name: P:JeniusApps.Nightingale.Data.Models.Item.Properties
member.summary: A dictionary of properties usually used by a GUI app.

member.name: P:JeniusApps.Nightingale.Data.Models.Item.Children
member.summary: List of children for this item.

member.name: P:JeniusApps.Nightingale.Data.Models.Item.ChainingRules
member.summary: List of chaining rules to be used after a request is sent.

member.name: P:JeniusApps.Nightingale.Data.Models.Item.IsExpanded
member.summary: Flag for whether this item is displaying its children in the UI or not.

member.name: P:JeniusApps.Nightingale.Data.Models.Item.Method
member.summary: HTTP method to be used for this request.

member.name: T:JeniusApps.Nightingale.Data.Models.ItemType
member.summary: Enum for the type of item this should be displayed in the tree.

member.name: F:JeniusApps.Nightingale.Data.Models.ItemType.None
member.summary: No type. Shouldn't be used in normal scenarios. Only added as a neutral default.

member.name: F:JeniusApps.Nightingale.Data.Models.ItemType.Collection
member.summary: Item is a collection of requests.

member.summary: Body to return when using a mock server.

member.name: P:JeniusApps.Nightingale.Data.Models.MockData.ContentType
member.summary: Content type to return when using a mock server.

member.summary: List of environments for this workspace.
